entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a code fix to suggest adding `partial` modifier #61611
    Backlog
  • indentation is off when fixing up usings after a paste (32531.40.main) #61605
  • Analyzer Errors should not be filtered out by /p:WarningLevel=0 when Ruleset Rule is set to Action=Error #61603
  • Async backfill for completion #61600
  • Language version check is missing for an implicit implementation of a static virtual member #61598
  • Improved UX (error message) for generator users missing partial modifiers #61597
  • IDE0072 Add missing cases not well implemented when nullable #61594
    Backlog

Closed

  • Close a region at the #endregion code #61596
  • Position of new class method which is created outside of the class via VS-proposals seems to be arbitrary #61542
  • Annoying behavior when applying lightbulbs: scrolling to caret location after applying a fix (32526.111.main) #61560
  • Default `.editorconfig` creates properties that are tried to be localized #61595
  • Renaming a field causes the file to be renamed too #61591

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61616
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update comment #61614
    Area-IDE
  • Add an option to control if compilations are cloned when making skeletons #61613
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1798834 #61612
  • Update "file types" branch from main #61610
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove weak references in skeleton reference cache. #61608
    Area-IDE
  • Report a warning for multiple matches for implicit interface implementation of static member #61607
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Perform language version check for an implicit implementation of a static virtual member #61601
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Convert UTF-8 string literal analyzer/codefix to refactoring #61593
    Area-IDE
  • Move the semantics checks of Inheritance margin to OOP #61592
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61606
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P2
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61604
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.3 P2
  • Update required members status #61602
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P2
  • Fix generation location when generating across files #61599
    Area-IDE, 17.3 P2
  • InlineHintsTagger: Fix assumption that GetSpans will retrieve a length greater than 0 #61567
    Area-IDE, 17.3 P2
  • EnC: Implements support for adding and removing await/yield return in C# - IDE #61521
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P2
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3 P2

Updated

  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers
  • Add collapsedText to foldingRange #61590
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Include local-functions in the go-to index. #61568
    Area-IDE
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
